教 材 大 綱 ：

      本課程的設計以歷史人物、歷史小說及專題研究分析兩方面同時進行，基本上著重以英雄人物與文化的角度做歷史趨勢的闡述，因而課程方面包括歷史與人物、三國演義與水滸傳等歷史小說及史學方法論，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內能對中國歷史文化與社會有一簡要而清晰的瞭解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。

      This course is intended to introduce historical characters and historical novels as well as to do studies in specific topics.  The focus will be on the interpretation of history from the viewpoints of historical heroes and cultural perspectives.  The topics include discussions on major historical characters such as Shang Yang, the Han Emperor, Wang An-shih.  Studies on such historical novels as The Romance of the Three Kings and The Romance of Shui-hu and introduction to Historical Methodology will also be emphasized.
